entry.title: Wednesday: Cloudy. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind east 30 km/h. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning late this evening. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
